actions.description: The champion makes two Arcane Burst attacks or makes one Arcane Burst attack and uses Spellcasting.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) force damage.
actions.name: Arcane Burst

actions.description:
The champion casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
At will: Light, Mage Armor (self only), Mage Hand, Minor Illusion

2/day each: Charm Person, Disguise Self, Silent Image

1/day each: Crown of Madness, Shatter
actions.name: Spellcasting
